title: Simple Ways to Safely Clean Under Laptop Keyboard Keys

steps.title: Pop off the sticky keys with a screwdriver.
steps.content: Pop off the sticky keys with a screwdriver.

steps.title: Apply an all-surface cleaner to the rag and wipe the keyboard with it.
steps.content: Apply an all-surface cleaner to the rag and wipe the keyboard with it.

steps.title: Put all of the keys back on after it dries.
steps.content: Put all of the keys back on after it dries.

steps.title: Buy special cleaning putty.
steps.content: Buy special cleaning putty. This is usually available cheaply online and in-store.

steps.title: The putty will form its shape over the keys and seep through the cracks.
steps.content: The putty will form its shape over the keys and seep through the cracks.

steps.title: Pull the putty carefully off the keyboard, so as to not break off the keys.
steps.content: Pull the putty carefully off the keyboard, so as to not break off the keys. Wash off any dirt and crumbs.

steps.title: Repeat all over the keyboard for a thorough clean.
steps.content: Repeat all over the keyboard for a thorough clean.
